H0.text: The currency of Venezuela is named after which revolutionary. Simón Bolívar

H1.text: The currency of Venezuela is named after which revolutionary. Francisco de Miranda

H2.text: The currency of Venezuela is named after which revolutionary. José Antonio Páez

H3.text: The currency of Venezuela is named after which revolutionary. Ziortza

A4.text: The bolívar is named after the hero of South American independence Simón Bolívar
